data.text: Due, Ao ɔdesɛefoɔ Asiria,
Ao Awurade, hunu yɛn mmɔbɔ;
Aman no te wo nne mmobɔmu a, wɔdwane;
Sɛdeɛ ntutummɛ tu hyɛ asase so we so nnɔbaeɛ no;
Wɔama Awurade so, na ɔte ɔsorosoro;
Ɔbɛyɛ fapem a atim yie wɔ mo mmerɛ so,
Monhwɛ, wɔn mmarima akokoɔdurufoɔ su teateaam wɔ mmɔntene so;
Akwantempɔn no so da hɔ kwa,
Asase no awo wesee na ɛresɛe,
“Afei na mɛsɔre,” sei na Awurade seɛ.
Monyinsɛne ntɛtɛ,
Wɔbɛhye aman no ama wɔayɛ sɛ akaadoo;
Mo a mowɔ akyirikyiri no, montie deɛ mayɛ;
Nnebɔneyɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ Sion abɔ huboa;
Deɛ ɔnante tenenee mu
saa onipa yi na ɔbɛtena ɔsorosoro hɔ.
Mo ani bɛhunu ɔhene no wɔ nʼanimuonyam mu
Mo adwendwene mu no, mobɛbooboo deɛ na ɔhunahuna mo no ho:
Morenhunu saa ahantanfoɔ no bio,
Monhwɛ Sion, yɛn afahyɛ kuropɔn no;
Ɛhɔ na Awurade bɛyɛ yɛn Otumfoɔ.
Na Awurade ne yɛn ɔtemmufoɔ,
Wo ntampehoma mu ago
Obiara nni Sion a ɔbɛka sɛ, “Meyare”;
